list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: Investigation Editor now has icons as well, Y0 has been capped.

marker.ph: <<UserControl.Resources> <converter:MonsterIconConverter x:Key="MonsterIconConverter"/> <converter:BoxIconConverter x:Key="BoxIconConverter"/> </UserControl.Resources> <Grid> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <!-- State Controls --> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <!-- Goal&Rank --> <RowDefinition Height="2*" /> <!-- Monsters --> <RowDefinition Height="4*" /> <!-- Stats --> <RowDefinition Height="2*" /> <!-- Values --> <RowDefinition Height="7*" /> <!-- Rewards --> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <!-- Rewards Display --> <RowDefinition Height="2*" /> <!-- Warnings Box Display --> <RowDefinition Height="3*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <!-- State Controls --> <Grid Grid.Row="0"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="3*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Button Grid.Column="0" Command="{Binding FirstRecord}" ><<</Button> <Button Grid.Column="1" Command="{Binding PreviousRecord}"><</Button> <Button Grid.Column="2" Command="{Binding ToggleRecord}" Content="{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/ToggleState}"/> <Button Grid.Column="3" Command="{Binding NextRecord}">></Button> <Button Grid.Column="4" Command="{Binding LastRecord}">>></Button> </Grid> <!-- Goal --> <Grid Grid.Row = "1"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <ComboBox Grid.Row="0" ItemsSource = "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/GoalChoices, Mode = OneWay}" SelectedIndex= "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Goal, Mode = TwoWay}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" IsEnabled="{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Filled}" /> <ComboBox Grid.Row="1" ItemsSource = "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/RankChoices, Mode = OneWay}" SelectedIndex= "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Rank, Mode = TwoWay}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" IsEnabled="{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Filled}" /> </Grid> <!-- Monsters --> <Grid Grid.Row="2"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="3*" /> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Image Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="0" Source = "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Mon1, Mode = OneWay, Converter = {StaticResource MonsterIconConverter}}" /> <Image Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="1" Source = "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Mon2, Mode = OneWay, Converter = {StaticResource MonsterIconConverter}}"/> <Image Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="2" Source = "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Mon3, Mode = OneWay, Converter = {StaticResource MonsterIconConverter}}"/> <Grid Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="0"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="7*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <CheckBox Grid.Column="0" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" IsChecked="{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/M1Temper, Mode=TwoWay}" IsEnabled="{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Filled}" /> <ComboBox Grid.Column="1" HorizontalAlignment="Stretch" ItemsSource = "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/MonsterNames, Mode = OneWay}" SelectedIndex= "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Mon1, Mode = TwoWay}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" IsEnabled="{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Filled}" /> </Grid> <Grid Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="1"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="7*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <CheckBox Grid.Column="0" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" IsChecked="{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/M2Temper, Mode=TwoWay}" IsEnabled="{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Filled}" /> <ComboBox Grid.Column="1" HorizontalAlignment="Stretch" ItemsSource = "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/MonsterNames, Mode = OneWay}" SelectedIndex= "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Mon2, Mode = TwoWay}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" IsEnabled="{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Filled}" /> </Grid> <Grid Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="2"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="7*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <CheckBox Grid.Column="0" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" IsChecked="{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/M3Temper, Mode=TwoWay}" IsEnabled="{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Filled}"/> <ComboBox Grid.Column="1" HorizontalAlignment="Stretch" ItemsSource = "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/MonsterNames, Mode = OneWay}" SelectedIndex= "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Mon3, Mode = TwoWay}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" IsEnabled="{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Filled}" /> </Grid> </Grid> <!-- Stats --> <Grid Grid.Row="3"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="1*"/> <RowDefinition Height="1*"/> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <TextBlock Grid.Column="0" Grid.Row="0" HorizontalAlignment="Center">HP</TextBlock> <TextBlock Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="0" HorizontalAlignment="Center">Att</TextBlock> <TextBlock Grid.Column="2" Grid.Row="0" HorizontalAlignment="Center">Def</TextBlock> <TextBlock Grid.Column="3" Grid.Row="0" HorizontalAlignment="Center">Size?</TextBlock> <xctk:IntegerUpDown Grid.Column="0" Grid.Row="1" Minimum="0" Maximum="5" HorizontalAlignment="Center" AllowTextInput = "False" Value = "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/HP, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode = TwoWay}" IsEnabled="{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Filled}"/> <xctk:IntegerUpDown Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="1" Minimum="0" Maximum="5" HorizontalAlignment="Center" AllowTextInput = "False" Value = "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Attack, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode = TwoWay}" IsEnabled="{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Filled}"/> <xctk:IntegerUpDown Grid.Column="2" Grid.Row="1" Minimum="0" Maximum="5" HorizontalAlignment="Center" AllowTextInput = "False" Value = "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Defense, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode = TwoWay}" IsEnabled="{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Filled}"/> <xctk:IntegerUpDown Grid.Column="3" Grid.Row="1" Minimum="0" Maximum="2" HorizontalAlignment="Center" AllowTextInput = "False" Value = "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/X3, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode = TwoWay}" IsEnabled="{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Filled}"/> </Grid> <!-- Values --> <Grid Grid.Row="4"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="2*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <TextBlock Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="0" Style="{StaticResource InvestigationLabel}">Faints: </TextBlock> <ComboBox Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="1" Style="{StaticResource InvestigationDropdown}" ItemsSource = "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/FaintValues}" SelectedIndex= "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/FaintIndex, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode = TwoWay}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" IsEnabled="{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Filled}" /> <TextBlock Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="0" Style="{StaticResource InvestigationLabel}">Player Count: </TextBlock> <ComboBox Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="1" Style="{StaticResource InvestigationDropdown}" ItemsSource = "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/PlayerCountValues}" SelectedIndex= "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/PlayerCountIndex, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode = TwoWay}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" IsEnabled="{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Filled}" /> <TextBlock Grid.Row="2" Grid.Column="0" Style="{StaticResource InvestigationLabel}">Zenny Bonus Multiplier: </TextBlock> <xctk:IntegerUpDown Grid.Row="2" Grid.Column="1" Minimum="0" Maximum="4" AllowTextInput = "False" Value = "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/ZennyBonus, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode = TwoWay}" IsEnabled="{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Filled}"/> <TextBlock Grid.Row="3" Grid.Column="0" Style="{StaticResource InvestigationLabel}">Locale: </TextBlock> <ComboBox Grid.Row="3" Grid.Column="1" Style="{StaticResource InvestigationDropdown}" ItemsSource = "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/LocalesNames}" SelectedIndex= "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/LocaleIndex, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode = TwoWay}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" IsEnabled="{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Filled}" /> <TextBlock Grid.Row="4" Grid.Column="0" Style="{StaticResource InvestigationLabel}">Flourish: </TextBlock> <ComboBox Grid.Row="4" Grid.Column="1" Style="{StaticResource InvestigationDropdown}" ItemsSource = "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/CurrentFlourishes}" SelectedIndex= "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/FlourishIndex, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode = TwoWay}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" IsEnabled="{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Filled}" /> <TextBlock Grid.Column="0" Grid.Row="5" Style="{StaticResource InvestigationLabel}">Attempts: </TextBlock> <xctk:IntegerUpDown Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="5" Minimum="1" Maximum="10" AllowTextInput = "False" Value = "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Attempts, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode = TwoWay}" IsEnabled="{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Filled}"/> <TextBlock Grid.Column="0" Grid.Row="6" Style="{StaticResource InvestigationLabel}">Y0</TextBlock> <xctk:IntegerUpDown Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="6" Minimum="0" Maximum="2" AllowTextInput = "False" Value = "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Y0, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode = TwoWay}" IsEnabled="{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Filled}"/> <TextBlock Grid.Column="0" Grid.Row="7" Style="{StaticResource InvestigationLabel}">Y3: </TextBlock> <CheckBox Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="7" HorizontalAlignment = "Right" VerticalAlignment="Center" IsChecked = "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Y3, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode = TwoWay}" IsEnabled="{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Filled}"/> </Grid> <!-- Rewards --> <Grid Grid.Row="5"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="5*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <TextBlock Grid.Column="0" Style="{StaticResource InvestigationLabel}" >Rewards: </TextBlock> <xctk:IntegerUpDown Grid.Column="1" Minimum="0" Maximum="2" AllowTextInput = "False" Value = "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/MonsterRewards, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode = TwoWay}" IsEnabled="{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Filled}"/> </Grid> <!-- Rewards Display --> <Grid Grid.Row="6"> <Grid> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Image Grid.Column="0" Source = "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Box1Val, Converter = {StaticResource BoxIconConverter}}"/> <Image Grid.Column="1" Source = "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Box2Val, Converter = {StaticResource BoxIconConverter}}"/> <Image Grid.Column="2" Source = "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Box3Val, Converter = {StaticResource BoxIconConverter}}"/> <Image Grid.Column="3" Source = "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Box4Val, Converter = {StaticResource BoxIconConverter}}"/> <Image Grid.Column="4" Source = "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Box5Val, Converter = {StaticResource BoxIconConverter}}"/> </Grid> </Grid> <Grid Grid.Row="7"> <Border BorderThickness="1" BorderBrush="Gray"> <TextBlock Text = "{Binding InvestigationCollectionView/Legality, Mode = OneWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" ScrollViewer.HorizontalScrollBarVisibility="Disabled" ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility="Auto"/> </Border> </Grid> </Grid>.../>

task.summary: Default task
-Fixed checksum algorithm, it works correctly now. -Fixed encryption algorithm, it works correctly now. -Modified GUI in preparation for added editors.
Investigations tab now displays investigation list and controls.
Investigations tab is now element complete. Removed Business logic out of editor, will replace it for a warning of illegality until I learn to data bind as wpf wants things to be data binded.
Fixed Checksum Issues when saving.

Complete Refactoring -Investigation Completely Redone to be a thin layer over hex. -Investigation View Model now properly acts as a View Model for Investigation. -Rewrote the backup function to just use the operating system. -Fixed yet another checksum issue introduced by endianess.
Heavy UI Changes, UI functionality for investigations has been temporarily removed.
Heavy UI Changes, UI functionality for investigations has been temporarily removed.
UI Complete Refactorization. Investigations tab still in progress but save, open, edit steamId and backup work.
Forgot a file
Reached 0.1 features (gained data grid though it can be replaced with a list if performance continues to be an issue) but with a codebase that makes sense and proper classing and user controls.
Fixed resources hard coded path.
Fixes #3 Fixes #4
README Update
README Update
Fixed Unencrypted save not working properly.
Filter now works (without error handling).
Sorting now works.
Sorting refined into a more user friendly UX.
Sorting and Filtering now handle errors properly and simply display an error message and continues.
Autocommit added.
Fixed Edit and Tools in Investigation crashing when no investigation was selected.
Fixed Pasting without clipboard full.
Bounds Checking for Paste and Import at are now checked. Paste will no longer crash when done without a clipboard.
Git cleaning
Git cleaning
Added icon to the application.
Reduced memory leak due to dialog boxes. Changed text boxes to text blocks where possible to reduce memory leaks from cache.
Limited size of text inputs to further cut down on memory leakage.

Clearing an investigation no longer uses the default null investigation but a copy of it. Investigation initialization is now done with a copy of the provided array instead of the array reference itself.
Reimplemented the default sorting algorithm for investigations from n2 to n.
Prevented the DataGrid from allowing users to use it's sort function which breaks investigation back end.
Fixed Investigation title not updating.
More kiddie proofing. Datagrid no longer allows row deletion.
UI Skelleton for Inventory
Almost complete backend of Inventory Editing.
Got Inventory Areas to show up.
Working Inventory Editing (only images are missing).
Working Inventory Editing with icons and softcoded paths.
Investigation Editor now has icons as well, Y0 has been capped.
